Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.

items.content_html: The Reflection Application is a lightweight project built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to register, log in, and generate unique feedback links. Participants can submit anonymous feedback without logging in, and users can view all responses on a dashboard. Data is stored locally using browser LocalStorage.
items.title: Vaishnavibhadange/Reflection_Application: The Reflection Application is a lightweight project built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to register, log in, and generate unique feedback links. Participants can submit anonymous feedback without logging in, and users can view all responses on a dashboard. Data is stored locally using browser LocalStorage.
